channel.title: Markdown on R notes to myself
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on R notes to myself

item.title: Curiouser and curiouser
item.description: #Markdown tips for the R-Curious ##1. Make a heading using hash Use a single # for big headings, two ## for smaller headings and three ### for even smaller headings # Big heading ## Smaller heading ### Even smaller heading ##2. Link to websites Using a combination of square and round brackets. Put the text you want to appear in the doc in square brackets and the url in round brackets
